content: Which world-renowned physicist wrote a book titled 'A Brief History of Time', aiming to present complex cosmological concepts in an easily understandable way?

The world-renowned physicist who wrote the book 'A Brief History of Time' is Stephen Hawking. In this book, Hawking aimed to make complex concepts in cosmology and theoretical physics accessible to a general audience. He discusses topics such as the Big Bang, black holes, and the possibility of a unified theory that could explain the entire universe. The book has become a staple in popular science literature and has introduced millions of readers to the wonders of the cosmos.
